metadata.title: USN-3898-1 -- NSS vulnerability
metadata.description: Hanno BÃ¶ck and Damian Poddebniak discovered that NSS incorrectly handled certain CMS functions. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause NSS to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3898-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libnss3-dev - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2 libnss3 - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2 libnss3-tools - 2:3.35-2ubuntu2.2 No subscription required
